meanings.sent1: She hearkened to the sound of birds chirping outside her window.
meanings.sent2: The students hearkened carefully to the teacher's instructions.
meanings.sent3: The cat hearkened to the mouse scurrying across the floor.
meanings.sent4: His heart hearkened to the call of adventure.
meanings.sent5: The old man hearkened to the memories of his youth.

meanings.definition: Obey or follow through on a request or command
meanings.sent1: The loyal dog hearkened to its owner's command without hesitation.
meanings.sent2: She hearkened to her mother's advice and avoided trouble.
meanings.sent3: The robot hearkened to every input, never questioning its orders.
meanings.sent4: The soldier hearkened to his duty, even in the face of danger.
meanings.sent5: The athlete hearkened to the coach's guidance and improved his performance.
